blocks.name: gtnelioc
blocks.content: A real number larger than the upper bound of a left-open right-closed interval is not an element of the interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gtnelioc(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, clt, c0))
} = {
  mtbird(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2)))
  intn3an3d(w0, wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2))
  mpbid(w0, wn(wbr(c0, cle, c2)), wbr(c2, clt, c0))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c2, clt, c0), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c2))), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  rexrd(c2, w0)
  xrltnle(c2, c0)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2))), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cr))
  elioc2(c1, c2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gtnelioc(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0 ∈(c1[(,]]c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[<]c0)
} = {
  mtbird(w0, c0 ∈(c1[(,]]c2), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1[<]c0 ∧ c0[≤]c2))
  intn3an3d(w0, c0 ∈ ℝ, c1[<]c0, c0[≤]c2)
  mpbid(w0, ¬ c0[≤]c2, c2[<]c0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c2[<]c0 ↔ ¬ c0[≤]c2), c2 ∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈ ℝ*)
  rexrd(c2, w0)
  xrltnle(c2, c0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ∈(c1[(,]]c2)↔(c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1[<]c0 ∧ c0[≤]c2)), c1 ∈ ℝ*, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  elioc2(c1, c2, c0)
}

blocks.name: ioossioc
blocks.content: An open interval is a subset of its right closure. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm ioossioc(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c0, cioc, c1))
} = {
  ixxssixx(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c0, cioo, c1, cioc, clt, clt, clt, cle)
  df-ioo(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  df-ioc(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  idd(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cv(hs3), cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs3)))
  xrltle(cv(hs3), c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.c(cle)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(clt)
  diff.hs2.c(cle)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(cioo)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(cioc)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ioossioc(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[(,)]c1)⊆(c0[(,]]c1)
} = {
  ixxssixx(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c0, cioo, c1, cioc, clt, clt, clt, cle)
  df-ioo(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  df-ioc(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  idd((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ hs3 ∈ ℝ*), c0[<]hs3)
  xrltle(hs3, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.c(cle)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(clt)
  diff.hs2.c(cle)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(cioo)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(cioc)
}

} = {

  iooin(c0, c1, c2, c3)

  simpll2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wbr(c2, clt, c3)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1)))
  simprr(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wbr(c2, clt, c3))), wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  xrmineq(c1, c3)

  pm2.61dan(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wbr(c2, clt, c3))), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1))), wbr(cif(c2, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c2)), clt, c3), wbr(c0, cle, c2))

  simplr3(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wbr(c2, clt, c3), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1)))

  simplrl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wbr(c2, clt, c3))), wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c2)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wbr(c2, clt, c3))), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1))), wb(wne(co(cif(c2, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c2)), cioo, c3), emptycls), wbr(cif(c2, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c2)), clt, c3)), wcel(cif(c2, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c2)), cxr), wcel(c3, cxr))
  ifcld(c2, c0, cxr, wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wbr(c2, clt, c3))), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1))), wbr(c0, cle, c2))
  simplr1(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wbr(c2, clt, c3), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1)))

blocks.name: ltnelicc
blocks.content: A real number smaller than the lower bound of a closed interval is not an element of the interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm ltnelicc(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
} = {
  mtbird(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2)))
  intnanrd(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2))
  mpbid(w0, wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0))), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  xrltnle(c0, c1)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2))), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  rexrd(c1, w0)
  elicc4(c1, c2, c0)
}

thm ltnelicc(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[<]c1)
} = {
  mtbird(w0, c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2), (c1[≤]c0 ∧ c0[≤]c2))
  intnanrd(w0, c1[≤]c0, c0[≤]c2)
  mpbid(w0, ¬ c1[≤]c0, c0[<]c1)

  elin(c1, co(c0, cfv(cbl, ccom(cabs, cmin)), c2), cr)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wcel(c1, co(c0, cfv(cbl, ccom(cabs, cmin)), c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wbr(co(c0, ccom(cabs, cmin), c1), clt, c2))), wcel(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(cxmet, cc)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cxr))
  a1i(w0, wcel(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(cxmet, cc)))

  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)

  diff.hs3.c(c1)

  diff.hs3.c(clt)
  diff.hs3.c(cicc)
  diff.hs3.c(cioo)

}

blocks.name: lbioc
blocks.content: A left-open right-closed interval does not contain its left endpoint. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm lbioc(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wn(wcel(c0, co(c0, cioc, c1)))
} = {
  pm2.65i(wcel(c0, co(c0, cioc, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c0))
  simprld(wcel(c0, co(c0, cioc, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  biimpi(wcel(c0, co(c0, cioc, c1)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  elixx3g(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c0, cioc, c1, clt, cle)
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c0, cioc, c1)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c0)), wcel(c0, cxr))
  elmpt2cl1(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, cioc, c1, cxr, cxr, crab(hs2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), cle, cv(hs1)))))
  df-ioc(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  xrltnr(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.c(cle)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(clt)
  diff.hs2.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.hs1.c(cxr)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lbioc(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ¬ c0 ∈(c0[(,]]c1)
} = {
  pm2.65i(c0 ∈(c0[(,]]c1), c0[<]c0)
  simprld(c0 ∈(c0[(,]]c1), c0[<]c0, (c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c0 ∈ ℝ*), c0[≤]c1)
  biimpi(c0 ∈(c0[(,]]c1), ((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c0 ∈ ℝ*)∧(c0[<]c0 ∧ c0[≤]c1)))
  elixx3g(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c0, cioc, c1, clt, cle)
  syl(c0 ∈(c0[(,]]c1), ¬ c0[<]c0, c0 ∈ ℝ*)
  elmpt2cl1(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, cioc, c1, cxr, cxr, { hs2 ∈ ℝ* |(hs0[<]hs2 ∧ hs2[≤]hs1)})
  df-ioc(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  xrltnr(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)

blocks.name: ioomidp
blocks.content: The midpoint is an element of the open interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm ioomidp(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), co(c0, cioo, c1)))
} = {
  eliood(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), c0, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(c0, cxr))
  rexr(c0)
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexr(c1)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), cr))
  rehalfcld(co(c0, caddc, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  readdcl(c0, c1)
  biimp3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, clt, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2)))
  avglt1(c0, c1)
  biimp3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), clt, c1))
  avglt2(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: iccdifioo
blocks.content: If the open inverval is removed from the closed interval, only the bounds are left. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm iccdifioo(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), cpr(c0, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), cpr(c0, c1), cdif(cun(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), co(c0, cioo, c1)), cdif(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  difeq1d(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1), cun(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  syl5reqr(co(c0, cicc, c1), cun(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  uncom(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1))
  prunioo(c0, c1)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(cdif(cun(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), co(c0, cioo, c1)), cdif(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1))))
  difun2(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(cdif(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), cpr(c0, c1)))
  eqcomi(cdif(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), cpr(c0, c1))
  mpbi(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cdif(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1))), wceq(cin(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), emptycls))
  eqtr3i(cin(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), emptycls, cin(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1)))
  incom(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1))
  iooinlbub(c0, c1)
  disj3(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1))
}

blocks.name: iccdifprioo
blocks.content: An open interval is the closed interval without the bounds. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm iccdifprioo(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), co(c0, cioo, c1)))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), co(c0, cioo, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wceq(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), co(c0, cioo, c1)))
  syl6eq(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), co(c0, cioo, c1), cdif(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), cpr(c0, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  difeq1d(co(c0, cicc, c1), cpr(c0, c1), cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  eqcomd(co(c0, cicc, c1), cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  prunioo(c0, c1)
  eqtr4i(cdif(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), cpr(c0, c1)), co(c0, cioo, c1), cdif(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1)))
  difun2(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1))
  mpbi(wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), cdif(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1))), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), emptycls))
  iooinlbub(c0, c1)
  disj3(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1))
  eqtr4d(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wceq(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), emptycls), wss(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), emptycls))
  sseqtrd(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), emptycls, co(c0, cicc, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  difssd(co(c0, cicc, c1), cpr(c0, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wceq(co(c0, cicc, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cicc, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  icc0(c0, c1)
  ss0(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), cpr(c0, c1)))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  xrltled(c1, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  notnotrd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  mtbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0))))
  xrlenlt(c0, c1)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
  ioo0(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: ioossioobi
blocks.content: Biconditional form of ~ ioossioo . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm ioossioobi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3)))
  jca(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3))), wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3))
  3brtr3d(c2, cle, c0, cinf(co(c2, cioo, c3), cxr, clt), cinf(co(c0, cioo, c1), cxr, clt), wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3))))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3))), wbr(cinf(co(c2, cioo, c3), cxr, clt), cle, cinf(co(c0, cioo, c1), cxr, clt)), wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wss(co(c2, cioo, c3), cxr))
  infxrss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3))), wceq(cinf(co(c2, cioo, c3), cxr, clt), c2), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wne(co(c2, cioo, c3), emptycls))
  ixxlb(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c2, c3, cioo, clt, clt)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3))), wceq(cinf(co(c0, cioo, c1), cxr, clt), c0), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls))
  ixxlb(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c0, c1, cioo, clt, clt)
  3brtr3d(c1, cle, c3, csup(co(c0, cioo, c1), cxr, clt), csup(co(c2, cioo, c3), cxr, clt), wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3))))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3))), wbr(csup(co(c0, cioo, c1), cxr, clt), cle, csup(co(c2, cioo, c3), cxr, clt)), wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wss(co(c2, cioo, c3), cxr))
  ixxssxr(hs0, hs1, hs2, c2, cioo, c3, clt, clt)
  supxrss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3))), wceq(csup(co(c0, cioo, c1), cxr, clt), c1), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls))
  adantr(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wcel(c0, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  ixxub(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c0, c1, cioo, clt, clt)
  idd(wa(wcel(cv(hs3), cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(cv(hs3), clt, c1))
  xrltle(cv(hs3), c1)
  idd(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cv(hs3), cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs3)))
  xrltle(c0, cv(hs3))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3))), wceq(csup(co(c2, cioo, c3), cxr, clt), c3), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wne(co(c2, cioo, c3), emptycls))
  adantr(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wcel(c2, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wcel(c3, cxr))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3))), wne(co(c2, cioo, c3), emptycls), wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wne(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls))
  simpr(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wne(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls))
  mpbird(w0, wne(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wne(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  ioon0(c0, c1)
  ssn0(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3))
  ixxub(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c2, c3, cioo, clt, clt)
  df-ioo(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  idd(wa(wcel(cv(hs3), cxr), wcel(c3, cxr)), wbr(cv(hs3), clt, c3))
  xrltle(cv(hs3), c3)
  idd(wa(wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(cv(hs3), cxr)), wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs3)))
  xrltle(c2, cv(hs3))
  syl22anc(wa(w0, wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3))), wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3)), wcel(c2, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3)), wcel(c3, cxr))
  simprl(w0, wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3))
  simprr(w0, wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3))
  ioossioo(c2, c3, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)

  diff.hs2.s(hs3)

  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)

}

blocks.name: iccshift
blocks.content: A closed interval shifted by a real number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm iccshift(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cicc, co(c2, caddc, c1)), crab(s0, cc, wrex(s1, co(c0, cicc, c2), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, c1))))))

blocks.name: iccsuble
blocks.content: An upper bound to the distance of two elements in a closed interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm iccsuble(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), cle, co(c2, cmin, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, cicc, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c3, cicc, c2)))
} = {
  le2subd(c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c0, co(c3, cicc, c2)))
  eliccre(c3, c2, c0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c1, co(c3, cicc, c2)))
  eliccre(c3, c2, c1)
  simp3d(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c2), wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c3, cle, c0))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c3, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cicc, c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c3, cicc, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c3, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2))), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  elicc2(c3, c2, c0)
  simp2d(w0, wbr(c3, cle, c1), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c3, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wcel(c1, co(c3, cicc, c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c1, co(c3, cicc, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c3, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  elicc2(c3, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: iocopn
blocks.content: A left-open right-closed interval is an open set of the standard topology restricted to an interval that contains the original interval and has the same upper bound. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm iocopn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cle, c0))
} = {
  3eltr3d(co(c0, cioc, c1), c2, cin(co(c0, cioo, cpnf), co(c3, cioc, c1)), co(c4, crest, co(c3, cioc, c1)), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(cin(co(c0, cioo, cpnf), co(c3, cioc, c1)), co(c4, crest, co(c3, cioc, c1))), wcel(c4, ctop), wcel(co(c3, cioc, c1), universe), wcel(co(c0, cioo, cpnf), c4))
  a1i(w0, wcel(c4, ctop))
  eqeltri(c4, ctop, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  retop()
  ovexd(c3, cioc, c1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(c0, cioo, cpnf), c4))
  eleqtrri(co(c0, cioo, cpnf), c4, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  iooretop(c0, cpnf)
  elrestr(c4, ctop, co(c3, cioc, c1), universe, co(c0, cioo, cpnf))
  eqrdv(hs0, cin(co(c0, cioo, cpnf), co(c3, cioc, c1)), co(c0, cioc, c1), w0)
  impbida(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cioo, cpnf), co(c3, cioc, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioc, c1)))
  eliocd(cv(hs0), c0, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cioo, cpnf), co(c3, cioc, c1)))))

blocks.name: eliccelioc
blocks.content: Membership in a closed interval and in a left-open right-closed interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm eliccelioc(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wne(c0, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wne(c0, c1)))

  sseli(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2), co(c1, cicc, c2))
  iocssicc(c1, c2)
  gtned(c0, c1, wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2)), wcel(c1, cr))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2))), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexrd(c2, wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2)), wcel(c2, cr))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2)))
  iocgtlb(c1, c2, c0)
  eliocd(c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wne(c0, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wne(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wne(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wne(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, cxr))
  leneltd(c1, c0, wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wne(c0, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wne(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, cr))
  adantrr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wne(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cr))
  sselda(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2), cr, w0)
  iccssred(c1, c2, w0)
  adantrr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wne(c0, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2))), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  iccgelb(c1, c2, c0)
  simprr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wne(c0, c1))
  adantrr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wne(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c2))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2))), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexrd(c1, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c2, cxr))
  rexrd(c2, w0)
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)))

blocks.name: iooshift
blocks.content: An open interval shifted by a real number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:

  nfan(s1, w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wrex(s1, co(c0, cioo, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), caddc, c1)))))
  nfv(s1, w0)

  nfv(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cioo, co(c2, caddc, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wrex(s1, co(c0, cioo, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), caddc, c1)))), wi(wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cioo, c2)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), caddc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cioo, co(c2, caddc, c1))))))
  3exp(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cioo, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), caddc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cioo, co(c2, caddc, c1))))

  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cioo, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wcel(c0, cxr))
  rexrd(c0, w0)

  recnd(cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cioo, co(c2, caddc, c1)))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cioo, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))

  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cioo, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wcel(c1, cc))
  recnd(c1, w0)
  rspceeqv(s1, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1), co(c0, cioo, c2), cv(hs0), co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1), caddc, c1), co(cv(s1), caddc, c1))
  oveq1(cv(s1), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c1), caddc, c1)
  elrab(s0, cv(hs0), cc, wrex(s1, co(c0, cioo, c2), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, c1))), wrex(s1, co(c0, cioo, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), caddc, c1))))
  rexbidv(s1, co(c0, cioo, c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), caddc, c1)))
  eqeq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), caddc, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, cc, wrex(s1, co(c0, cioo, c2), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, c1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cioo, co(c2, caddc, c1)))

  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), caddc, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s1), caddc, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cc)
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cioo, co(c2, caddc, c1)))

blocks.name: iccintsng
blocks.content: Intersection of two adiacent closed intervals is a singleton. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm iccintsng(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wceq(cin(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c1, cicc, c2)), csn(c1)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cin(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c1, cicc, c2)), csn(c1), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))))
  3bitr4g(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c1, cicc, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  impbid(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  mpbir2and(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2)))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2))))
  iccleub(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2)))), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2))))
  simprr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  iccgelb(c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2)))), wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)))
  jca(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  simprl(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  eliccxr(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2))))
  xrletri3(cv(hs0), c1)
  ex(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2))))
  jca(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  syl31anc(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  simpll1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  simplrl(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  eqeltrd(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1), c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c1, co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  ubicc2(c0, c1)
  syl31anc(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  simpll2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  simpll3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  simplrr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  simpr(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  eqeltrd(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2), c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c1, co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  lbicc2(c1, c2)
  elin(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c1, cicc, c2))
  velsn(hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))))
}

blocks.name: icoiccdif
blocks.content: Left-closed right-open interval gotten by a closed iterval taking away the upper bound. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm icoiccdif(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(co(c0, cico, c1), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1))))
} = {
  eqelssd(hs0, co(c0, cico, c1), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)))
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c0, cico, c1), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1))))
  eldifd(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, c1))))
  sselda(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, c1), co(c0, cicc, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wss(co(c0, cico, c1), co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  icossicc(c0, c1)
  sylnibr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  neneqd(cv(hs0), c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, c1))))
  necomd(cv(hs0), c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, c1))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, c1))), wne(c1, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1))
  simp1d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, c1)))
  simp3d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, c1))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)))
  biimpa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, c1)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1)))
  elico1(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  xrltne(cv(hs0), c1)
  velsn(hs0, c1)
  elicod(cv(hs0), c0, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1)))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1))))
  simp2d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1)))), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1)))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1), wne(c1, cv(hs0)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1))), wne(c1, cv(hs0)))
  necomd(c1, cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1))))
  eldifsni(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1), c1)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1)))), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1), wne(c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  eliccxr(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  simplr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1))))
  simp3d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1)))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)))
  mpbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1)))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  eldifi(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))))
  elicc1(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  xrleltne(cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cico, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), csn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)))
}

blocks.name: icoopn
blocks.content: A left-closed right-open interval is an open set of the standard topology restricted to an interval that contains the original interval and has the same lower bound. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm icoopn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cico, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cxr))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c4, crest, co(c0, cico, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c3))
} = {
  3eltr3d(co(c0, cico, c1), c2, cin(co(cmnf, cioo, c1), co(c0, cico, c3)), co(c4, crest, co(c0, cico, c3)), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(cin(co(cmnf, cioo, c1), co(c0, cico, c3)), co(c4, crest, co(c0, cico, c3))), wcel(c4, ctop), wcel(co(c0, cico, c3), universe), wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, c1), c4))
  a1i(w0, wcel(c4, ctop))
  eqeltri(c4, ctop, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  retop()
  ovexd(c0, cico, c3, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, c1), c4))
  eleqtrri(co(cmnf, cioo, c1), c4, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  iooretop(cmnf, c1)
  elrestr(c4, ctop, co(c0, cico, c3), universe, co(cmnf, cioo, c1))
  eqrdv(hs0, cin(co(cmnf, cioo, c1), co(c0, cico, c3)), co(c0, cico, c1), w0)
  impbida(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(cmnf, cioo, c1), co(c0, cico, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, c1)))
  elicod(cv(hs0), c0, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(cmnf, cioo, c1), co(c0, cico, c3)))))

  elioore(cv(hs0), cmnf, c1)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(cmnf, cioo, c1), co(c0, cico, c3)))), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(cmnf, cioo, c1), co(c0, cico, c3))), wcel(c0, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(cmnf, cioo, c1), co(c0, cico, c3))), wcel(c3, cxr))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(cmnf, cioo, c1), co(c0, cico, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cico, c3)))
  elinel2(cv(hs0), co(cmnf, cioo, c1), co(c0, cico, c3))

  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(cmnf, cioo, c1), co(c0, cico, c3)))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1), wcel(cmnf, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cmnf, cioo, c1)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(cmnf, cioo, c1), co(c0, cico, c3)))), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(cmnf, cioo, c1), co(c0, cico, c3))), wcel(c1, cxr))

blocks.name: icoub
blocks.content: A left-closed, right-open interval does not contain its upper bound. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm icoub(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wn(wcel(c1, co(c0, cico, c1))))
} = {
  pm2.65da(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, co(c0, cico, c1)), wbr(c1, clt, c1))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, co(c0, cico, c1))), wbr(c1, clt, c1), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c1, co(c0, cico, c1)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, co(c0, cico, c1)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, co(c0, cico, c1)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, co(c0, cico, c1)))
  icoltub(c0, c1, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, co(c0, cico, c1)), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c1)))
  syl(wcel(c1, co(c0, cico, c1)), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c1)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  sseldi(c1, cxr, co(c0, cico, c1), wcel(c1, co(c0, cico, c1)))
  icossxr(c0, c1)
  id(wcel(c1, co(c0, cico, c1)))
  xrltnr(c1)
}

blocks.name: eliccnelico
blocks.content: An element of a closed interval that is not a member of the left-closed right-open interval, must be the upper bound. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm eliccnelico(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, cicc, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, co(c2, cico, c1))))
} = {
  xrletrid(c0, c1, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, co(c2, cicc, c1)))
  iccleub(c2, c1, c0)
  condan(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c0), wcel(c0, co(c2, cico, c1)))
  elicod(c0, c2, c1, wa(w0, wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wcel(c2, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wcel(c0, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wbr(c2, cle, c0))
  syl3anc(w0, wbr(c2, cle, c0), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, co(c2, cicc, c1)))
  iccgelb(c2, c1, c0)
  mpbird(wa(w0, wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0))), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
  simpr(w0, wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0))))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0))), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c0, co(c2, cicc, c1)))
  eliccxr(c0, c2, c1)
  xrltnle(c0, c1)
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wn(wcel(c0, co(c2, cico, c1))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eliccnelico(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c2[[,]]c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c0 ∈(c2[[,)]c1))
} = {
  xrletrid(c0, c1, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, c0[≤]c1, c2 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈(c2[[,]]c1))
  iccleub(c2, c1, c0)
  condan(w0, c1[≤]c0, c0 ∈(c2[[,)]c1))
  elicod(c0, c2, c1, (w0 ∧ ¬ c1[≤]c0))
  adantr(w0, ¬ c1[≤]c0, c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  adantr(w0, ¬ c1[≤]c0, c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  adantr(w0, ¬ c1[≤]c0, c0 ∈ ℝ*)
  adantr(w0, ¬ c1[≤]c0, c2[≤]c0)
  syl3anc(w0, c2[≤]c0, c2 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈(c2[[,]]c1))
  iccgelb(c2, c1, c0)
  mpbird((w0 ∧ ¬ c1[≤]c0), c0[<]c1, ¬ c1[≤]c0)
  simpr(w0, ¬ c1[≤]c0)
  adantr(w0, ¬ c1[≤]c0, (c0[<]c1 ↔ ¬ c1[≤]c0))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[<]c1 ↔ ¬ c1[≤]c0), c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈(c2[[,]]c1))
  eliccxr(c0, c2, c1)
  xrltnle(c0, c1)
  adantr(w0, ¬ c1[≤]c0, ¬ c0 ∈(c2[[,)]c1))
}

blocks.name: eliccelicod
blocks.content: A member of a closed interval that is not the upper bound, is a member of the left-closed, right-open interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm eliccelicod(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cico, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, c2))
} = {
  elicod(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c0), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  iccgelb(c1, c2, c0)
  xrleneltd(c0, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  eliccxr(c0, c1, c2)
  syl3anc(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c2), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  iccleub(c1, c2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eliccelicod(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(c1[[,)]c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ c2)
} = {
  elicod(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, c1[≤]c0, c1 ∈ ℝ*, c2 ∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2))
  iccgelb(c1, c2, c0)
  xrleneltd(c0, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2))
  eliccxr(c0, c1, c2)
  syl3anc(w0, c0[≤]c2, c1 ∈ ℝ*, c2 ∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2))
  iccleub(c1, c2, c0)
}

blocks.name: ge0xrre
blocks.content: A nonnegative extended real that is not ` +oo ` is a real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ge0xrre(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(c0, cpnf)), wcel(c0, cr))
} = {
  sseldi(c0, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(c0, cpnf)))
  rge0ssre()
  elicod(c0, nat0, cpnf, wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(c0, cpnf)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(c0, cpnf)), wcel(nat0, cxr))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(c0, cpnf), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  a1i(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  id(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  iccgelb(nat0, cpnf, c0)
  xrleneltd(c0, cpnf, wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(c0, cpnf)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(c0, cpnf), wcel(c0, cxr))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(c0, cpnf)), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(c0, cpnf), wbr(c0, cle, cpnf))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wbr(c0, cle, cpnf), wcel(c0, cxr))
  eliccxr(c0, nat0, cpnf)
  pnfge(c0)
  simpr(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(c0, cpnf))
}

blocks.name: ge0lere
blocks.content: A nonnegative extended Real number smaller than or equal to a Real number, is a Real number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ge0lere(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wne(c0, cpnf))
  xrltned(c0, cpnf, w0)
  xrlelttrd(c0, cpnf, c1, w0)
  sseldi(c0, cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  rexrd(c1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  ltpnfd(c1, w0)
  ge0xrre(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ge0lere(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[≤]c1)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, c0 ∈ ℝ, c0 ∈(0[[,]]+∞), c0 ≠ +∞)
  xrltned(c0, cpnf, w0)
  xrlelttrd(c0, cpnf, c1, w0)
  sseldi(c0, cxr, (0[[,]]+∞), w0)
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  rexrd(c1, w0)
  a1i(w0, +∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  pnfxr()
  ltpnfd(c1, w0)
  ge0xrre(c0)
}

blocks.name: elicores

blocks.origin:
thm elicores(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, crn(cres(cico, cxp(cr, cr)))), wrex(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cr, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitri(wcel(c0, crn(cres(cico, cxp(cr, cr)))), wrex(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cr, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cr, cr, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1))))))), wrex(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cr, wceq(c0, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1))))))))
  eleq2i(c0, crn(cres(cico, cxp(cr, cr))), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cr, cr, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1)))))))
  rneqi(cres(cico, cxp(cr, cr)), cmpo(s0, s1, cr, cr, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1))))))
  eqtri(cres(cico, cxp(cr, cr)), cmpo(s0, s1, cr, cr, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1))))), cres(cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1))))), cxp(cr, cr)))
  reseq1i(cico, cxp(cr, cr), cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1))))))
  df-ico(s0, s1, hs0)
  mp2an(wceq(cres(cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1))))), cxp(cr, cr)), cmpo(s0, s1, cr, cr, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1)))))), wss(cr, cxr), wss(cr, cxr))
  resmpt2(s0, s1, cr, cxr, cr, cxr, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1)))))
  elrnmpt2(s0, s1, c0, cmpo(s0, s1, cr, cr, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1))))), cr, cr, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1)))))
  eqid(cmpo(s0, s1, cr, cr, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1))))))
  rabex(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1))))
  xrex()
  rexbiia(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cr, wceq(c0, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1)))))), wrex(s1, cr, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cv(s1)))))
  rexbidva(s1, cr, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(c0, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1))))), wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cv(s1))))
  eqeq2d(c0, crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1)))), co(cv(s0), cico, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)))
  eqcomd(crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1)))), co(cv(s0), cico, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cico, cv(s1)), crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cv(s1), cxr))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cxr))
  sseli(cv(s0), cr, cxr)
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cxr))
  sseli(cv(s1), cr, cxr)
  ressxr()
  icoval(hs0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cr)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
}

thm elicores(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ran(([,)|`(ℝ × ℝ)))↔ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, c0 =(s0[[,)]s1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitri(c0 ∈ ran(([,)|`(ℝ × ℝ))), ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, c0 =(s0[[,)]s1))), c0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ ↦ { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)})), ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, c0 = { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)})))
  eleq2i(c0, ran(([,)|`(ℝ × ℝ))), ran((s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ ↦ { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)})))
  rneqi(([,)|`(ℝ × ℝ)), (s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ ↦ { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)}))
  eqtri(([,)|`(ℝ × ℝ)), (s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ ↦ { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)}), ((s0 ∈ ℝ*, s1 ∈ ℝ* ↦ { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)})|`(ℝ × ℝ)))
  reseq1i(cico, (ℝ × ℝ), (s0 ∈ ℝ*, s1 ∈ ℝ* ↦ { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)}))
  df-ico(s0, s1, hs0)
  mp2an(((s0 ∈ ℝ*, s1 ∈ ℝ* ↦ { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)})|`(ℝ × ℝ))=(s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ ↦ { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)}), ℝ ⊆ ℝ*, ℝ ⊆ ℝ*)
  resmpt2(s0, s1, cr, cxr, cr, cxr, { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)})
  elrnmpt2(s0, s1, c0, (s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ ↦ { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)}), cr, cr, { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)})
  eqid((s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ ↦ { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)}))
  rabex(hs0, cxr, (s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1))
  xrex()
  rexbiia(s0, cr, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, c0 = { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)}), ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, c0 =(s0[[,)]s1)))
  rexbidva(s1, cr, s0 ∈ ℝ, c0 = { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)}, c0 =(s0[[,)]s1))
  eqeq2d(c0, { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)}, (s0[[,)]s1), (s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  eqcomd({ hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)}, (s0[[,)]s1), (s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  syl2anc((s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ), (s0[[,)]s1)= { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[≤]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]s1)}, s0 ∈ ℝ*, s1 ∈ ℝ*)
  adantr(s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ ℝ*)
  sseli(s0, cr, cxr)
  adantl(s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ*)
  sseli(s1, cr, cxr)
  ressxr()
  icoval(hs0, s0, s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, cr)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)

blocks.name: inficc
blocks.content: The infimum of a nonempty set, included in a closed interval, is a member of the interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm inficc(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
} = {
  eliccxrd(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), c1, c2, w0)
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c1, cle, cinf(c0, cxr, clt)), wral(hs0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  iccgelb(c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c1, cle, cinf(c0, cxr, clt)), wral(hs0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))), wss(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  infxrgelb(hs0, c0, c1)
  mpd(w0, wbr(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cle, c2), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  n0(hs0, c0)
  exlimdv(hs0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cle, c2))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cle, c2))
  xrletrd(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), c2, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cxr))
  syl(w0, wcel(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cxr), wss(c0, cxr))
  infxrcl(c0)
  sseldi(cv(hs0), cxr, co(c1, cicc, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cle, cv(hs0)), wss(c0, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(c0, cxr))
  sstrd(c0, cxr, co(c1, cicc, c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(co(c1, cicc, c2), cxr))
  iccssxr(c1, c2)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  infxrlb(c0, cv(hs0))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c1, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c2, cxr))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c0, co(c1, cicc, c2), w0)
  iccleub(c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cle, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm inficc(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → inf(c0, ℝ*, <)∈(c1[[,]]c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆(c1[[,]]c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ ∅)
} = {
  eliccxrd(inf(c0, ℝ*, <), c1, c2, w0)
  mpbird(w0, c1[≤]inf(c0, ℝ*, <), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]hs0))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, c1[≤]hs0)
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), c1[≤]hs0, c1 ∈ ℝ*, c2 ∈ ℝ*, hs0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2))
  iccgelb(c1, c2, hs0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c1[≤]inf(c0, ℝ*, <)↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]hs0)), c0 ⊆ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  infxrgelb(hs0, c0, c1)
  mpd(w0, inf(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]c2, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c0))
  sylib(w0, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c0), c0 ≠ ∅)
  n0(hs0, c0)
  exlimdv(hs0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0, inf(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]c2)
  ex(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, inf(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]c2)
  xrletrd(inf(c0, ℝ*, <), c2, hs0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, inf(c0, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*)
  syl(w0, inf(c0, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*, c0 ⊆ ℝ*)
  infxrcl(c0)
  sseldi(hs0, cxr, (c1[[,]]c2), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), inf(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]hs0, c0 ⊆ ℝ*, hs0 ∈ c0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, c0 ⊆ ℝ*)
  sstrd(c0, cxr, (c1[[,]]c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, (c1[[,]]c2)⊆ ℝ*)
  iccssxr(c1, c2)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  infxrlb(c0, hs0)
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs0[≤]c2, c1 ∈ ℝ*, c2 ∈ ℝ*, hs0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  sselda(hs0, c0, (c1[[,]]c2), w0)
  iccleub(c1, c2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(inf(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]c2)
}

thm qinioo(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(cin(cq, co(c0, cioo, c1)), emptycls), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wceq(cin(cq, co(c0, cioo, c1)), emptycls), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  condan(wa(w0, wceq(cin(cq, co(c0, cioo, c1)), emptycls)), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wceq(cin(cq, co(c0, cioo, c1)), emptycls))
  simplr(w0, wceq(cin(cq, co(c0, cioo, c1)), emptycls), wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
  adantlr(w0, wceq(cin(cq, co(c0, cioo, c1)), emptycls), wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wn(wceq(cin(cq, co(c0, cioo, c1)), emptycls)))
  neneqd(cin(cq, co(c0, cioo, c1)), emptycls, wa(w0, wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0))))
  syldan(w0, wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wne(cin(cq, co(c0, cioo, c1)), emptycls), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  biimpar(w0, wn(wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  xrltnled(c0, c1, w0)
  sylibr(wa(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wne(cin(cq, co(c0, cioo, c1)), emptycls), wrex(hs0, cq, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioo, c1))))
  mpd(wa(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wrex(hs0, cq, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioo, c1))), wrex(hs0, cq, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1))))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wrex(hs0, cq, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1))), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(c0, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(c1, cxr))
  simpr(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  qbtwnxr(hs0, c0, c1)
  reximdva(hs0, cq, wa(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioo, c1)))
  adantlr(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioo, c1))))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioo, c1)))
  eliood(cv(hs0), c0, c1, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1)), wcel(c0, cxr))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  ad2antlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  qre(cv(hs0))
  simprl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cq)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1))
  simprr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cq)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1))
  inn0(hs0, cq, co(c0, cioo, c1))
  syl(wa(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wceq(cin(cq, co(c0, cioo, c1)), emptycls), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls))
  biimpar(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c0), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  ioo0(c0, c1)
  syl6eq(cin(cq, co(c0, cioo, c1)), emptycls, cin(cq, emptycls), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls))
  ineq2(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls, cq)
  in0(cq)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cq)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cioo, c1))
}

blocks.name: lenelioc
blocks.content: A real number smaller than or equal to the lower bound of a left-open right-closed interval is not an element of the interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm lenelioc(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2))))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
} = {
  mtbird(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2)))

  mpbid(w0, wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  xrlenltd(c0, c1, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2))), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  elioc1(c1, c2, c0)

blocks.name: ioonct
blocks.content: A nonempty open interval is uncountable. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)

thm ioonct(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, cdom, com)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))

} = {
  pm2.65da(w0, wbr(c0, cdom, com), wceq(co(c1, cioo, c2), emptycls))
  eqtr3d(co(c1, cioo, c2), emptycls, cfv(cfv(cnt, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), co(c1, cioo, c2)), wa(w0, wbr(c0, cdom, com)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cdom, com)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cnt, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), co(c1, cioo, c2)), co(c1, cioo, c2)))
  ioontr(c1, c2)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cdom, com)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cnt, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), co(c1, cioo, c2)), emptycls), wss(co(c1, cioo, c2), cr), wbr(co(c1, cioo, c2), cdom, cn))
  a1i(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cdom, com)), wss(co(c1, cioo, c2), cr))
  ioossre(c1, c2)
  adantl(w0, wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(co(c1, cioo, c2), cdom, cn))
  syl2anc(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(co(c1, cioo, c2), cdom, cn), wbr(co(c1, cioo, c2), cdom, com), wbr(com, cen, cn))
  biimpi(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(co(c1, cioo, c2), cdom, com))
  breq1i(c0, cdom, com, co(c1, cioo, c2))
  a1i(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(com, cen, cn))
  ensymi(com, cn)
  nnenom()
  domentr(co(c1, cioo, c2), com, cn)
  rectbntr0(co(c1, cioo, c2))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, cdom, com), wn(wceq(co(c1, cioo, c2), emptycls)))
  neneqd(co(c1, cioo, c2), emptycls, w0)

blocks.name: xrgtnelicc
blocks.content: A real number greater than the upper bound of a closed interval is not an element of the interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrgtnelicc(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, clt, c0))
} = {
  mtbird(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2)))
  intnand(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2))
  mpbid(w0, wn(wbr(c0, cle, c2)), wbr(c2, clt, c0))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c2, clt, c0), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c2))), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  xrltnle(c2, c0)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2))), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  elicc4(c1, c2, c0)
}

blocks.name: iccdificc
blocks.content: The difference of two closed intervals with the same lower bound. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm iccdificc(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)), co(c2, cioc, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c2))
} = {
  eqelssd(hs0, cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)), co(c2, cioc, c1), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wss(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)), co(c2, cioc, c1)), wral(hs0, cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1)))
  eliocd(cv(hs0), c2, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)))))
  condan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)))), wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c2)))
  eliccxrd(cv(hs0), c0, c2, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)))), wn(wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0)))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2))), wn(wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cxr))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)))), wn(wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0))), wcel(c2, cxr))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)))), wn(wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)))), wn(wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0))), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)))), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  iccgelb(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  mpbird(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)))), wn(wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2), wn(wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0))))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)))), wn(wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0))))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)))), wn(wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0))), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2), wn(wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0)))))
  xrlenltd(cv(hs0), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr))
  sseldi(cv(hs0), cxr, co(c0, cicc, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2))))
  iccssxr(c0, c1)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2))), wcel(c2, cxr))
  ad2antlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2))), wn(wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c2))))
  eldifn(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2))), wcel(c0, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2))), wcel(c1, cxr))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  eldifi(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2))
  iccleub(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  dfss3(hs0, cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)), co(c2, cioc, c1))
  eldifd(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1))))
  eliccxrd(cv(hs0), c0, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1))))
  xrltled(c0, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1))))
  xrlelttrd(c0, cv(hs0), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c2))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1)))
  iocleub(c2, c1, cv(hs0))
  xrgtnelicc(cv(hs0), c0, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1)), wcel(c0, cxr))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr))
  sseldi(cv(hs0), cxr, co(c2, cioc, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1)))
  iocssxr(c2, c1)
  id(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1))), wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1)), wcel(c2, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioc, c1)))
  iocgtlb(c2, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, cioc, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: iocnct
blocks.content: A nonempty left-open, right-closed interval is uncountable. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm iocnct(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, cdom, com)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c1, cioc, c2))
} = {
  ssnct(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2), w0)
  ioonct(co(c1, cioo, c2), c1, c2, w0)
  eqid(co(c1, cioo, c2))
  a1i(w0, wss(co(c1, cioo, c2), c0))
  sseqtr4i(co(c1, cioo, c2), c0, co(c1, cioc, c2))
  ioossioc(c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iocnct(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0[≼]_om)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[<]c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(c1[(,]]c2)
} = {
  ssnct(c0, (c1[(,)]c2), w0)
  ioonct((c1[(,)]c2), c1, c2, w0)
  eqid((c1[(,)]c2))
  a1i(w0, (c1[(,)]c2)⊆ c0)
  sseqtr4i((c1[(,)]c2), c0, (c1[(,]]c2))
  ioossioc(c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: iccnct
blocks.content: A closed interval, with more than one element is uncountable. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm iccnct(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, cdom, com)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2))
} = {
  ssnct(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2), w0)
  ioonct(co(c1, cioo, c2), c1, c2, w0)
  eqid(co(c1, cioo, c2))
  a1i(w0, wss(co(c1, cioo, c2), c0))
  sseqtr4i(co(c1, cioo, c2), c0, co(c1, cicc, c2))

}

thm iccnct(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0[≼]_om)

blocks.name: ressiocsup
blocks.content: If the supremum belongs to a set of reals, the set is a subset of the unbounded below, right-closed interval, with upper bound equal to the supremum. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

thm ressiocsup(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))

  -| wceq(c2, csup(c0, cxr, clt))

} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wss(c0, c1)), wi(w0, wcel(c2, c0)))
  sylibr(w0, wss(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eleqr(cv(hs0), c1, co(cmnf, cioc, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eliocd(cv(hs0), cmnf, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  syl5eqel(c2, cxr, csup(c0, cxr, clt), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  supxrcld(c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c0, cxr, w0)
  mnfltd(cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sseldd(cv(hs0), cr, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(c0, cr))
  breqtrd(cv(hs0), cle, c2, csup(c0, cxr, clt), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, csup(c0, cxr, clt)), wss(c0, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(c0, cxr))
  sstrd(c0, cxr, cr, w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(cr, cxr))
  ressxr()
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  supxrub(c0, cv(hs0))
  eqcomd(csup(c0, cxr, clt), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(c2, csup(c0, cxr, clt)))
  dfss3(hs0, c0, c1)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm ressiocsup(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ c2 = sup(c0, ℝ*, <)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(-∞[(,]]c2)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0 ⊆ c1), (w0 → c2 ∈ c0))

  mnfxr()
  syl5eqel(c2, cxr, sup(c0, ℝ*, <), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  supxrcld(c0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  sselda(hs0, c0, cxr, w0)
  mnfltd(hs0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  sseldd(hs0, cr, c0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  breqtrd(hs0, cle, c2, sup(c0, ℝ*, <), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs0[≤]sup(c0, ℝ*, <), c0 ⊆ ℝ*, hs0 ∈ c0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, c0 ⊆ ℝ*)
  sstrd(c0, cxr, cr, w0)
  a1i(w0, ℝ ⊆ ℝ*)
  ressxr()
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  supxrub(c0, hs0)
  eqcomd(sup(c0, ℝ*, <), c2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  a1i((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), c2 = sup(c0, ℝ*, <))
  dfss3(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

  dfss3(hs0, c0, c1)

thm ressioosup(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c1)

  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, cn, co(c0, cioo, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0))))))), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat1)), cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioo, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat1)))))

  eliind(s0, cv(hs0), co(c0, cioo, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat1))), cn, co(c0, cioo, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)))), nat1, wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, cn, co(c0, cioo, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)))))))
  id(wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, cn, co(c0, cioo, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)))))))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, cn, co(c0, cioo, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)))))), wcel(nat1, cn))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioo, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)))), co(c0, cioo, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat1))), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))
  ioogtlb(c0, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat1)), cv(hs0))

blocks.name: ressiooinf
blocks.content: If the infimum does not belong to a set of reals, the set is a subset of the unbounded above, left-open interval, with lower bound equal to the infimum. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm ressiooinf(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wceq(c2, cinf(c0, cxr, clt))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c2, c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c2, cioo, cpnf))
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wss(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eleqr(cv(hs0), c1, co(c2, cioo, cpnf), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eliood(cv(hs0), c2, cpnf, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  xrleneltd(c2, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  syl5eqel(c2, cxr, cinf(c0, cxr, clt), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  infxrcld(c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c0, cxr, w0)
  syl5eqbr(c2, cle, cv(hs0), cinf(c0, cxr, clt), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), cle, cv(hs0)), wss(c0, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(c0, cxr))
  sstrd(c0, cxr, cr, w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(cr, cxr))
  ressxr()
  infxrlb(c0, cv(hs0))
  necomd(c2, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  neqned(cv(hs0), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  pm2.65da(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c2, c0))
  adantll(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c2, c0))
  eqeltrd(c2, c0, cv(hs0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantl(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(c2, cv(hs0)))
  eqcomd(c2, cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(c2, c0)))
  ltpnfd(cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sseldd(cv(hs0), cr, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(c0, cr))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  dfss3(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ressiooinf(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ c2 = inf(c0, ℝ*, <)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c2 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(c2[(,)]+∞)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, c0 ⊆ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  syl6eleqr(hs0, c1, (c2[(,)]+∞), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  eliood(hs0, c2, cpnf, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  a1i((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), +∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  pnfxr()
  xrleneltd(c2, hs0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  syl5eqel(c2, cxr, inf(c0, ℝ*, <), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  infxrcld(c0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  sselda(hs0, c0, cxr, w0)
  syl5eqbr(c2, cle, hs0, inf(c0, ℝ*, <), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), inf(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]hs0, c0 ⊆ ℝ*, hs0 ∈ c0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, c0 ⊆ ℝ*)
  sstrd(c0, cxr, cr, w0)
  a1i(w0, ℝ ⊆ ℝ*)
  ressxr()
  infxrlb(c0, hs0)
  necomd(c2, hs0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  neqned(hs0, c2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  pm2.65da((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs0 = c2, c2 ∈ c0)
  adantll(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c2, c2 ∈ c0)
  eqeltrd(c2, c0, hs0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c2))
  adantl(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c2, c2 = hs0)
  eqcomd(c2, hs0, hs0 = c2)
  id(hs0 = c2)
  simpl(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c2)
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c2, ¬ c2 ∈ c0)
  ltpnfd(hs0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  sseldd(hs0, cr, c0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  dfss3(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: icogelbd
blocks.content: An element of a left-closed right-open interval is greater than or equal to its lower bound. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: iocleubd
blocks.content: An element of a left-open right-closed interval is smaller than or equal to its upper bound. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: uzinico
blocks.content: An upper interval of integers is the intersection of the integers with an upper part of the reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

thm uzinico(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

  elicod(cv(hs0), c1, cpnf, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c1, cxr))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr))
  sseldi(cv(hs0), cxr, cz, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  sstri(cz, cxr, cr)
  ressxr()
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1)))

  sseldi(cv(hs0), cr, cz, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  zssre()
  eluzelz2(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cz, co(c1, cico, cpnf))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eluzd(cv(hs0), c0, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cz, co(c1, cico, cpnf)))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cz, co(c1, cico, cpnf))), wcel(c1, cz))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cz, co(c1, cico, cpnf))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  elinel1(cv(hs0), cz, co(c1, cico, cpnf))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cz, co(c1, cico, cpnf))), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cico, cpnf)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cz, co(c1, cico, cpnf))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cico, cpnf)))
  elinel2(cv(hs0), cz, co(c1, cico, cpnf))
  icogelbd(c1, cv(hs0), cpnf, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cico, cpnf))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cico, cpnf)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexrd(c1, w0)
  zred(c1, w0)
